title: Companion Approval Guide
content: ach + None Sentinel Olak Goblin Camp - The Goblin Guard post in front of the bridge. Boo Volo during his performance Rescue Volo Requirement/s: Talk to him during his performance and give a really scathing review Astarion +Lae'zel + Karlach - Volo Goblin Camp - The central party area. Volo will be in the middle of the Camp performing. With Tracker Grikka tell "I can get info out of the prisoner" Requirement/s: Nothing special, just tell the dialogue line to Grikka Astarion +Lae'zel +Shadowheart
